summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackHSA/FSA eligibleFirst Aid Beauty's Ultra Repair cream instantly relieves dry, distressed skin + eczema, plus strengthens skin barrier in 7 days for calm, comfortable skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsAward-winning, rich hydrating formula quickly absorbs with no greasy after-feelSkin feels comfortable after just one use24 hours of soothing hydrationTreats eczema + speeds up skin renewal to strengthen surface barrier for long-term reliefMade with Colloidal Oatmeal, a skin protectant and barrier-building ingredientSafe for sensitive skin and good for face + bodyNon-comedogenicKey IngredientsColloidal Oatmeal (OTC): Treats eczema + improves skin renewal for stronger skin barrierShea Butter: Moisturizes and protects the skin barrierAllantoin: Calms and soothes skinResearch ResultsClinically proven to strengthen skin barrier in 7 days*In an independent clinical study with 21 participants:More than 2x immediate increase in skin hydration***In a consumer perception study with 21 participants after 2 weeks:100% reported the product helped soothe, moisturize, and condition skin**Item 2567979How To UseApply as needed.IngredientsActive: Colloidal Oatmeal 0.5%. Inactive: Water, Stearic Acid, Glycerin, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glyceryl Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetearyl Alcohol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Dimethicone, Squalane, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Allantoin, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Chrysanthemum Parthenium (Feverfew) Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Ceramide NP, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: Daily skin Drink
reviews.comments: It leaves you skin smooth with no irritation.

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer
reviews.comments: I've been using this for a while and the  bottle lasts so long. Leaves my skin super hydrated without feelinng oil

reviews.headline: My holly grail
reviews.comments: This is soo good for dry skin I use it everyday . It's really moisturizing

reviews.headline: NOT For Rosacea!!
reviews.comments: I was recommended this line of cleanser and cream by someone who works for Ulta. The day after I used it my face broke out and was flared up worse than I've ever seen it. Do NOT EVER recommend this line to someone with redness, rosacea, or eczema. It'll just make it 100 times worse and take forever to get back to "normal".

reviews.headline: Best moisturizer on the planet!
reviews.comments: This is the only lotion I now use. I am a scent girl so when buying lotions, I am always attracted to the ones that have my favorite scents. And I have tried a lot of brands. Recently, I had a minor skin issue on my wrist. It was red and itchy and I tried all my different lotions on it to make it improve. When I finally tried this, it disappeared. It's a light-weight formula that absorbs into the skin. No greesy feeling. I have never been diagnosed with skin problems, but when that issue happened, I threw away all my other lotions. I will never buy any other product again. I do like its unscented, so I can layer my scent sprays so there is no competing scents.

reviews.headline: Eczema's Little Helper
reviews.comments: About 2 months ago I tried using a kojac tumeric retinol soap bar to help lighten up some dark spots on my arms, thighs, and face. That bar completely destroyed my once oily combination skin to be incredibly dry and in a constantly flaky state. It also flared up the eczema/kp on my summer arms to go down to my wrists with itchy, dry patches that were so rough to the touch. I tried all my usual lotions then reached for an old bottle of ultra repair cream that I bought on sale last Christmas. It has immensely helped my skin recover over the past 2 weeks!! The eczema/kp on my arms has shrunk down to the back 9f my upper arms again. I'm hesitant to try using it on my face since I think this is formulated more for the body and not the delicate, thinner skin of the face. Either way, I'm so so happy that I still had a jar of this and plan to purchase more once it runs out.

reviews.headline: dry itchy flaky crepey
reviews.comments: This is a miracle I've been using cerave's cream it's greasy and the lotion isn't enough. Mixing them together is messy and doesn't work well.  This cream is like a cloud, I wish I could afford the tub but price point is close to $80, on something on I need to use daily. There has to be an effective product that won't leave a grease spot on my sheets and a hole in my bank account?! But if money is not a problem this cream would be my number 1 go to.

reviews.headline: Holy Grail, Saved My Skin
reviews.comments:
I have combination skin with an extremely sensitive and acne prone tzone. I am not joking when I say THIS SAVED MY SKIN! I used the Elf Holy Hydration cream for a long time then got this for Christmas. 6 months later, I've finished the 6oz tub and gotten another!

Goes on so smooth, so calming, moisturizing, and plays well with my other products. And lays amazing under makeup. Forever repurchase. I love it so much.

reviews.headline: Surprising love! Must have for dry sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I got this during last year's Beauty steals not too sure what to expect, but it has turned out to resolve almost every skin issue I've ever had on my body. I have way way way fewer incidences of razor bumps, ingrown hairs, dry skin, eczema‚Ä¶ I'm pretty sure the list goes on, but this has been an amazing product for my super sensitive skin‚Äî healing my skin barrier and keeping my (previously) chronically dry skin deeply moisturized and glowy, not greasy. I wish the price point was a bit more sustainable when it's not a beauty steal item, but I gotta say - it's pretty worth it. Thank you FAB!

reviews.headline: Burns my skin
reviews.comments: This moisturizer immediately left a burning sensation on my skin. Had to wash off to stop the burning sensation. Beware if you have sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: It really works well. I love it!

reviews.headline: Buy this product again and again.
reviews.comments: I love this product it is not greasy it makes skin so soft.The price is good. I will buy again and again.

reviews.headline: I wish it worked for me:(
reviews.comments:
I enjoy how hydrating this cream is but unfortunately it irritates my skin and creates a stinging-like sensation. I didn't think I have sensitive skin but this cream is making me think otherwise lol üòÜ I have very dry skin though and it has been good for that. the stinging/burning sensation happens around my eyes and my cheeks.
since this is water based, it is wonderful under makeup üíÑ

reviews.headline: One of my favorite beauty items!
reviews.comments: This was my holy grail to maintain my fave hydrated and soft when I was on acne pills. It is light and absorbs into the skin well without leaving the skin feeling oily! I LOVE this product and I recommend it.

reviews.headline: My poor, chapped, sensitive skin
reviews.comments:
I have very dry, occasionally dehydrated, moderately  sensitive skin. I also prefer cruelty free products. And, I really don't want to break the bank on skincare products. Its not easy to find the combo I need but FAB checks all the boxes! 
This moisturizer saved my skin during the winter of 23-24 and I've never looked back. I walk about 1 mile to and from the train. Chicago winters aren't what you'd call mild.  My skin was so dry and irritated I was at a loss as to how to fix it. I came across this moisturizer and my skin was saved!  In less than a few days my skin calmed down and felt hydrated, not just moisturized. I haven't used anything else until last month when I switched to FAB's anti-aging moisturizer with peptides. I use both depending upon my needs. After exfoliating, on cold days, or when i just need a little extra hydration, I use my ultra repair cream.  This cream saved my skin.

reviews.headline: Not for acne prone!!
reviews.comments: I have very dry and acne prone skin and my skin has been very clear for a while now, but i started getting horrific breakouts recently and I didn't know why. I received this as a birthday gift recently so I took it out of my routine to see what would happen and my skin cleared up again. Very moisturizing but will break you out

reviews.headline: i swear its the best thing ive used for my eczema
reviews.comments: ive always had the worst eczema ever but i literally promise this is the best thing ive ever used for it!!! literally one use and my dry patches on my face are GONE my skin is so moisturized ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

reviews.headline: Not a fan of the smell
reviews.comments: The product is good but I don't think it's worth the price. I don't like the smell at all. It kind of smells medicated.

reviews.headline: Good product for dry skin and moisturizing but not for eczem
reviews.comments: I have been using this on and off for years now. Sometimes my skin loves it and obserb every little bit of this and sometimes it just doesn't do much. Does't do much for my eczema though.

reviews.headline: Ultra Repair Cream (Jumbo)
reviews.comments: I love this cream so much, I have went through 3 tubs! I eventually stopped wasting time, and saved up enough money to buy the jumbo (so worth it). I have read a couple reviews and I have heard about pilling? I wouldn't know if this is true or not since I only cleanse, moisturize, and protect. This product is and absoulte yes from me.

media.headline: Healed Allergic Reaction!
media.caption: Allergic reaction BEFORE using this lotion.

faceoff_positive.comments: I used to have combination skin until I (at 21 years old) broke out in eczema out of nowhere. My dermatologist recommended lotions but all where quite oily and did nothing for my very dry skin overall. As a birthday gift for my 22nd I received this and other products, this lotion is so light weight, dries so fast and even brightens my skin. I used this with the cleanser and my skin looks amazing!! Harsher brands made me breakout but this is so light and straight to the point. I'm wearing makeup more now since my skin has gotten so much smoother from this brand. Haven't had a breakout in so long! Will forever be a customer now and always.
faceoff_positive.headline: This is god sent

faceoff_negative.comments: I had really high hopes Upon buying this, particularly with all the good reviews. However I noticed that I have some sort of allergic reaction wearing this...it feels fine at first but after a few hours of wearing it I notice my skin gets super red and EXTREMELY ITCHY (in fact the reason it's probably so red is because I can't stop itching). It's very uncomfortable and not like any regular itches I have...Even after washing it off and putting anti-itch cream on it, it still itches! Very frustrating, and results in unattractive splotches all over my face. I do not have eczema however I do have sensitive skin, so BEWARE either way. I'm actually curious as to which ingredient in this it is that gives the allergic reaction, as I do not usually get reactions to moisturizer creams. I know this is different for everyone, but does anyone know if there is a common allergic ingredient in this? If like to know for future purposes...
faceoff_negative.headline: Leaves sensitive skin itchy and red
